article_title: Seven Palestinians killed in Israeli West Bank raid
sentence: Seven  Palestinians,  including  a  doctor,  have  been  killed  by  Israeli  forces  during  an  operation  in  Jenin  in  the  north  of  the  occupied  West  Bank,  the  Palestinian  health  ministry  has  said.

article_title: Seven Palestinians killed in Israeli West Bank raid
sentence: Dr  Oussaid  Jabareen,  a  50-year-old  surgeon  at  Jenin  Government  Hospital,  was  shot  dead  on  his  way  to  work,  according  to  the  ministry.
